Buyer pays for the return shipping, paid and insured for the full value. IF HOWEVER, IT IS SOMEHOW OUR MISTAKE, then we will promptly refund all your money, including the cost to ship it back, as soon as we receive the package back. Reminder - if we list something as USED, it was previously displayed, repackaged or show slight wear.
